description.value:
Trigger Your Solar Shield is destroyed while you have it raised.

Requirements You haven't used Black Hole or Supernova within the last 10 minutes.

Your solar shield collapses in on itself.

Graviton-Attuned Immediately use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Black Hole]{Black Hole} as a free action (if you have the Black Hole feat).

Photon-Attuned Immediately use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Supernova]{Supernova} as a free action (if you have the Supernova feat).

value.value: Solar Shield plus either Black Hole or Supernova
